UnitDefinition.Name: Exposure response specification uncertainty distribution types.
UnitDefinition.Description: Exposure response specification uncertainty distribution types.

Unit.Name: Normal
Unit.Description: Normal distribution parameterised by a mean and upper p95 percentile.

Unit.Name: LogNormal
Unit.Description: LogNormal distribution parameterised by a mean and upper p95 percentile.

Unit.Name: Triangular
Unit.Description: Triangular distribution specified by a mode and a lower and upper boundary.

Unit.Name: Uniform
Unit.Description: Uniform distribution specified by a mean and upper boundary.
